alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Lower Yukon Valley; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Upper Kuskokwim Valley; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 4:27AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Winter Storm Approaching West Coast of Alaska Late Tuesday Through Wednesday... A strong storm moving into the Bering Sea on Tuesday and Wednesday will bring heavy snow and possible blizzard conditions to St Lawrence Island and the Yukon Delta Tuesday night, and to the remainder of the West Coast of Alaska on Wednesday and Wednesday night. This will also bring snow into the Western and Central Interior Wednesday night and Thursday.
